ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So it will be. We will marry them to dark-eyed maidens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Just like that. We shall pair them with companions with large black eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus shall it be: and We shall espouse them to fair, wide-eyed maidens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall unite them to maidens with big black and white lovely eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So it is; and We have wedded them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So (it will be). And We shall marry them to Hur (fair females) with wide lovely eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus (shall it be), and We will wed them with Houris pure, beautiful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so; and We shall espouse them to wide-eyed houris,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Even so (it will be). And We shall wed them unto fair ones with wide, lovely eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so it will be. We shall wed them to maidens with large, dark eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Even so. And We shall pair them with fair damsels large- eyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So shall it be, and We shall wed them to black-eyed houris.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So; and We shall join them to fair women with beautiful, big, and lustrous eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So (it will be), and We shall marry them to Houris (female fair ones) with wide, lovely eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such, We shall wed them to wideeyed houris (the virgins of Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So it is, and We will wed them to lovely companions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:54] So [shall it be] (an implied al-amru, ‘the matter’, should be read as preceding this); and We shall pair them, either in conjugality or [meaning] We shall join them, with houris of beautiful eyes, women of the fairest complexion with wide and beautiful eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Even so (it will be)) this is the station of the believers in Paradise. (And We shall wed them unto fair ones with wide, lovely eyes) and beautiful faces.
